projects.title: Eye Tracking Algorithm Optimization
projects.description: Optimize existing eye tracking algorithms to improve their efficiency and accuracy, with real-time capabilities integrated with RUXAILAB project.

projects.title: Data Extraction for Sentiment Analysis from Usability Tests
projects.description: Develop tools and algorithms for extracting data from moderated and unmoderated usability tests specifically for sentiment analysis purposes using NLP techniques.

projects.title: Integration of heat maps into Remote Usability LAB
projects.description: Develop and integrate a tool that allows to record different heat maps including scroll maps, click maps, and move maps.

projects.title: Implementation of Card Sorting method on RUXAILAB
projects.description: Implement a novel usability analysis method based on card sorting, a research technique involving the categorization and organization of information through user collaboration.
